# InvocationEncoder

**Associated Type**

Type of [doc://com.apple.Swift/documentation/Distributed/DistributedTargetInvocationEncoder] that should be used when the Swift runtime needs to encode a distributed target call into an encoder, before passing it off to `remoteCall(...)`.

## Declaration

```swift
associatedtype InvocationEncoder : DistributedTargetInvocationEncoder where Self.InvocationEncoder.SerializationRequirement == Self.ResultHandler.SerializationRequirement
```
title: InvocationEncoder
